This documentation is for version 2.0.dev, which is not released yet.

Evalute (evaluate)

This module provides functions that can be used to evaluate the results of different analyses in quantitative historical linguistics, such as cognate detection analyses, or alignment analyses.

Functions

bcubes(lex[, gold, test, loans, pprint]) Compute B-Cubed scores for test and reference datasets.
pairs(lex[, gold, test, loans, pprint]) Compute pair scores for the evaluation of cognate detection algorithms.
diff(lex[, gold, test, loans, pprint, ...]) Write differences in classifications on an item-basis to file.
